title: Have requirement omissions and errors been provided to the appropriate process for resolution?
description: Have requirement omissions and errors been provided to the appropriate process for resolution?

title: Have design constraints (due to production processes, standards, procedures, technology, design environment and design guidance) been identified?
description: Have design constraints (due to production processes, standards, procedures, technology, design environment and design guidance) been identified?

title: Have all hardware item high-level requirements and derived requirements been developed?
description: Have all hardware item high-level requirements and derived requirements been developed?

title: Have all derived requirements and the requirements that are traceable to the upper-level requirements been independently validated (especially with respect to safety) at some hierarchical level by review, analysis or test?
description: Have all derived requirements and the requirements that are traceable to the upper-level requirements been independently validated (especially with respect to safety) at some hierarchical level by review, analysis or test?

title: Have all derived requirements and the requirements that are traceable to the upper-level requirements been validated  (especially with respect to safety) at some hierarchical level by review, analysis or test?
description: Have all derived requirements and the requirements that are traceable to the upper-level requirements been validated  (especially with respect to safety) at some hierarchical level by review, analysis or test?

title: Do the hardware requirements include the expected behavior of the design in response to abnormal and boundary conditions (i.e., Robustness Requirements)?
description: Do the hardware requirements include the expected behavior of the design in response to abnormal and boundary conditions (i.e., Robustness Requirements)?

title: Has a requirements review been held to ensure the acceptability of requirements and compliance to the guidelines of 6.3.3.1?
description: Has a requirements review been held to ensure the acceptability of requirements and compliance to the guidelines of 6.3.3.1?

title: Have derived high-level requirements been provided to the System Safety Assessment Process?
description: Have derived high-level requirements been provided to the System Safety Assessment Process?

title: Are the requirements traceable to system requirements? Are derived requirements traceable as far as possible through the hierarchical levels?
description: Are the requirements traceable to system requirements? Are derived requirements traceable as far as possible through the hierarchical levels?

title: Are the requirements complete and compliant with respect to  system requirements?
description: Are the requirements complete and compliant with respect to  system requirements?

title: Has traceability been established between the derived and high-level hardware requirements and the validation activities and results?
description: Has traceability been established between the derived and high-level hardware requirements and the validation activities and results?

title:
Have requirement omissions and errors from the validation process been fed back to the appropriate process for
resolution?
description:
Have requirement omissions and errors from the validation process been fed back to the appropriate process for
resolution?

title: If COTS IP is used, do the requirements include all the IP functions, including unused ones for deactivation?
description: If COTS IP is used, do the requirements include all the IP functions, including unused ones for deactivation?

title: Have the planned transition criteria for entering the Hardware Conceptual Design Process as identified in the PHAC and Hardware Development Plan been satisfied?
description: Have the planned transition criteria for entering the Hardware Conceptual Design Process as identified in the PHAC and Hardware Development Plan been satisfied?
